parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force cancellation of in progress tasks

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force delete if not in final stage

parameters.name: projects
parameters.description: A comma-separated list. Results must be associated with one of these project IDs.

parameters.name: released
parameters.description: Filter blueprints with at least one released version

parameters.name: versioned
parameters.description: Filter blueprints with at least one version

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by blueprint status: versioned / released

post.summary: Creates version for the given blueprint ID
Restores content of draft from versioned blueprint

requestScopeOrg.description: Flag to indicate blueprint can be requested from any project in org

dependsOnResources.description: Resource depends on other resources in the plan

ignoreDeleteFailures.description: Ignore delete failures in blueprint request

plan.description: Plan only without affecting existing deployment
